creatures.name: Kelpie
creatures.description: A shape-shifting water horse that lures travelers to their demise in the water

creatures.name: Naiad
creatures.description: A freshwater nymph that guards bodies of water.

creatures.name: Kraken
creatures.description: A colossal sea monster that sinks ships for fun.

creatures.name: Golem
creatures.description: A boulder based guardian animated by spells.

creatures.name: Pegasus
creatures.description: A majestic winged horse that soars through the clouds.

creatures.name: Wendigo
creatures.description: A chilling spirit with an insatiable hunger for flesh...it will mimic those close to you to get closer.

creatures.name: Mermaid
creatures.description: Beautiful half fish people with a hypnotic voice.

creatures.name: Banshee
creatures.description: A wailing spirit that determines death with her cries.

creatures.name: Elf
creatures.description: A magical tiny human skilled in archery and magic.

creatures.name: Centaur
creatures.description: A half-human, half-horse being known for its wisdom and combat.

creatures.name: Dragon
creatures.description: A legendary giant reptilian creature that spits fire.

creatures.name: Fairy
creatures.description: A tiny magical being with wings and a mischievous streak.

creatures.name: Unicorn
creatures.description: Flying mythical horse with a rainbow horn.

creatures.name: elfie
creatures.description: Flying mythical elf with a rainbow horn.
